mapper.select: select * from (select rownum no, n.* from (select * from board1 ) n order by no desc)n where no between #{beginList} and #{endList} order by no desc

sql.if: where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.insert: insert into board1(writer, title, content, filename, filepath, code) values (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code})
mapper.update: update board1 set readcnt = readcnt+1 where id=#{id}
